h1_title: Daoist's Basket of Fire and Water
h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Daoist's Basket of Fire and Water Location
content: The Daoist's Basket of Fire and Water can be found in the Flaming Mountains upon defeating the Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Daoist's_Basket_of_Fire_and_Water.md', within the main section titled 'Daoist's Basket of Fire and Water', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Daoist's Basket of Fire and Water Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Daoist's Basket of Fire and Water can be found in the Flaming Mountains upon defeating the Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast.
